org.jivesoftware.util.cache
Interface ClusterTask

All Superinterfaces:
Externalizable, Runnable, Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AddMember, BroadcastMessageRequest, BroadcastPresenceRequest, ChangeNickname, DestroyRoomRequest, GetAdminConsoleInfoTask, GetBasicStatistics, GetNewMemberRoomsRequest, GetNumberConnectedUsers, GetSessionsCountTask, IsPluginInstalledTask, MUCRoomTask, MUCServicePropertyClusterEventTask, NotifyComponentInfo, NotifyComponentRegistered, NotifyComponentUnregistered, OccupantAddedEvent, OccupantLeftEvent, PropertyClusterEventTask, RoomAvailableEvent, RoomRemovedEvent, RoomUpdatedEvent, SeniorMemberServicesRequest, ServiceAddedEvent, ServiceRemovedEvent, ServiceUpdatedEvent, UpdateHistoryStrategy, UpdateOccupant, UpdateOccupantRequest, UpdatePresence
public interface ClusterTask
extends Runnable, Externalizable

An interface to mix in Serializable and Runnable, which are both required for sending invocable tasks across a cluster.
